title: Police: Boy, 10, kills himself in Clearwater apartment complex
content:
PINELLAS COUNTY, Fla. -- A 10-year-old boy has died in an apparent suicide, Clearwater Police reported Thursday afternoon.
Clearwater Police said Ian Sevostjanov, a fifth grade student at Belleair Elementary, fatally shot himself before 8:27 a.m. at the Lindru Gardens Apartments located at 711 South Lincoln Ave. The boy was discovered dead at the scene at a bottom-floor apartment.
According to the latest information from CPD, Sevostjanov was in trouble with his mother over a behavioral issue as he prepared to go to school Thursday morning. He was sent to a room which contained the firearm used in the self-inflicted shooting.
Detectives are investigating how the firearm was stored and how Sevostjanov was able to find it.
Breaking: 10 year old shot and killed at Clearwater apartment. #wtsp pic.twitter.com/RSdtY97K2V
— Jennifer Titus (@jenntitus10) January 5, 2017
Stay with 10News for more from this developing story.
